name: Crazy Kangaroo
synopsis: A ground-breaking, super-addictive and unbelievably cute platform game from Gamelion that delivers pure awesomeness! MEET BARNEY - a cute kangaroo that was caught by evil poachers but luckily fell out of the aeroplane and now has to make his way home. Help him - you two should hop along together just fine! With intuitive Motion Sensor and Circle Pad controls, and handcrafted graphics, CRAZY KANGAROO is simply perfect. Give it a shot!
